keywords.name: Add Element
keywords.shortdoc: Adds a child element to the specified element.

keywords.name: Clear Element
keywords.shortdoc: Clears the contents of the specified element.

keywords.name: Copy Element
keywords.shortdoc: Returns a copy of the specified element.

keywords.name: Element Attribute Should Be
keywords.shortdoc: Verifies that the specified attribute is `expected`.

keywords.name: Element Attribute Should Match
keywords.shortdoc: Verifies that the specified attribute matches `expected`.

keywords.name: Element Should Exist
keywords.shortdoc: Verifies that one or more element match the given `xpath`.

keywords.name: Element Should Not Exist
keywords.shortdoc: Verifies that no element match the given `xpath`.

keywords.name: Element Should Not Have Attribute
keywords.shortdoc: Verifies that the specified element does not have  attribute `name`.

keywords.name: Element Text Should Be
keywords.shortdoc: Verifies that the text of the specified element is `expected`.

keywords.name: Element Text Should Match
keywords.shortdoc: Verifies that the text of the specified element matches `expected`.

keywords.name: Element To String
keywords.shortdoc: Returns the string representation of the specified element.

keywords.name: Elements Should Be Equal
keywords.shortdoc: Verifies that the given `source` element is equal to `expected`.

keywords.name: Elements Should Match
keywords.shortdoc: Verifies that the given `source` element matches `expected`.

keywords.name: Get Child Elements
keywords.shortdoc: Returns the child elements of the specified element as a list.

keywords.name: Get Element
keywords.shortdoc: Returns an element in the `source` matching the `xpath`.

keywords.name: Get Element Attribute
keywords.shortdoc: Returns the named attribute of the specified element.

keywords.name: Get Element Attributes
keywords.shortdoc: Returns all attributes of the specified element.

keywords.name: Get Element Count
keywords.shortdoc: Returns and logs how many elements the given `xpath` matches.

keywords.name: Get Element Text
keywords.shortdoc: Returns all text of the element, possibly whitespace normalized.

keywords.name: Get Elements
keywords.shortdoc: Returns a list of elements in the `source` matching the `xpath`.

keywords.name: Get Elements Texts
keywords.shortdoc: Returns text of all elements matching `xpath` as a list.

keywords.name: Log Element
keywords.shortdoc: Logs the string representation of the specified element.

keywords.name: Parse Xml
keywords.shortdoc: Parses the given XML file or string into an element structure.

keywords.name: Remove Element
keywords.shortdoc: Removes the element matching `xpath` from the `source` structure.

keywords.name: Remove Element Attribute
keywords.shortdoc: Removes attribute `name` from the specified element.

keywords.name: Remove Element Attributes
keywords.shortdoc: Removes all attributes from the specified element.

keywords.name: Remove Elements
keywords.shortdoc: Removes all elements matching `xpath` from the `source` structure.

keywords.name: Save Xml
keywords.shortdoc: Saves the given element to the specified file.

keywords.name: Set Element Attribute
keywords.shortdoc: Sets attribute `name` of the specified element to `value`

keywords.name: Set Element Tag
keywords.shortdoc: Sets the tag of the specified element to `tag`.

keywords.name: Set Element Text
keywords.shortdoc: Sets text and/or tail text of the specified element.
